scripts.start: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run dev" "tsc --noEmit --watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently "vite build --config vite.config.sidepanel.ts --watch" "vite build --config vite.config.content.ts --watch" "vite build --config vite.config.background.ts --watch"
scripts.build: npm run clean && vite build --config vite.config.sidepanel.ts && vite build --config vite.config.content.ts && vite build --config vite.config.background.ts && tsx scripts/sync-version.ts
scripts.test: npm run format:check && npm run typecheck
